scripts.dev:with-db: prisma migrate deploy --schema ../../prisma/schema.prisma && prisma db push --schema ../../prisma/schema.prisma && next dev
scripts.dev:sqlite: DATABASE_URL="file:./dev.db" prisma generate --schema ../../prisma/schema.sqlite.prisma && DATABASE_URL="file:./dev.db" prisma db push --schema ../../prisma/schema.sqlite.prisma && PRISMA_SCHEMA_PATH=../../prisma/schema.sqlite.prisma DATABASE_URL="file:./dev.db" next dev --hostname 127.0.0.1 --port ${PORT:-3000}
scripts.build: prisma migrate deploy --schema ../../prisma/schema.prisma && prisma db push --schema ../../prisma/schema.prisma && next build
scripts.build:sqlite: DATABASE_URL="file:./dev.db" prisma generate --schema ../../prisma/schema.sqlite.prisma && DATABASE_URL="file:./dev.db" prisma db push --schema ../../prisma/schema.sqlite.prisma && PRISMA_SCHEMA_PATH=../../prisma/schema.sqlite.prisma DATABASE_URL="file:./dev.db" next build
scripts.start:sqlite: DATABASE_URL="file:./dev.db" prisma generate --schema ../../prisma/schema.sqlite.prisma && DATABASE_URL="file:./dev.db" prisma db push --schema ../../prisma/schema.sqlite.prisma && PRISMA_SCHEMA_PATH=../../prisma/schema.sqlite.prisma DATABASE_URL="file:./dev.db" next start --hostname 127.0.0.1 --port ${PORT:-3000}
